application.doc: Downloading one or more support files

param.name: record_ids
param.doc: A comma delimited list of the IDs of the support files to be downloaded

method.name: GET
method.id: Download one or more support files
method.doc: To download one or more support files with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the download parameter on the Support URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: 200 OK The support file or zip file containing several support files

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.
